channel.title: Member Ship

item.title: Member Ship
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

“What must I do now, so that members can wear certain items that normal players can’t.”

You make a boolean with a list of items that are members only.

Or use the CL method for item requirements, and use premZ as a requirement or whatever.
